column1: Uchi////Brought my sister to Uchi while she was visiting. We had amazing and attentive waitstaff
column2: who answered all of our questions. We sat at the bar where the chefs made sushi right in front of us
column3: so it was also visually fun! Our chef explained the history of sushi
column4: as well as a few of the steps while making it
column5: so we felt like royalty--definitely recommend this seat if you're a foodie. The ingredients are super fresh and we even got a free dessert on the house from our chef (after ordering one
column6: of course haha)! Best high-end experience I've had in Houston so far. Come here if you want to impress someone or if you're celebrating. Just be prepared for a little bit of a wait (nice waiting area outside with water/drinks). Enjoy!
